mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_book_chapter(id,ts_book_id,parentid,chapter_name,grade,sequence,create_by_id,createtime) select #{chapter_id}, id ,#{chapter_id_parent},#{chapter_name},#{grade},#{sequence},#{opUser},#{opTime} FROM ts_book WHERE bookname=#{bookName} and status=0
mapper.select: SELECT id,parentid,sequence,grade,chapter_name as chapter FROM ts_book_chapter WHERE parentid=#{id} and status=0 order by sequence
SELECT id,parentid,sequence,grade,chapter_name as chapter FROM ts_book_chapter WHERE grade=1 and ts_book_id=any(SELECT id FROM ts_book WHERE bookname=#{bookName}) and status=0 order by sequence
SELECT bookname,parentid,chapter_name as chaptername FROM ts_book inner JOIN ts_book_chapter on ts_book.id=ts_book_chapter.ts_book_id AND ts_book_chapter.id=#{chapterId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_book_chapter set parentid=#{parentid} ,chapter_name=#{chapterName},sequence=#{sequence},grade=#{grade},lastupdatetime=#{opTime},lastupdate_by_id=#{opUser} WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE ts_book_chapter as b LEFT JOIN ts_book_content as c on b.id=c.ts_book_chapter_id LEFT JOIN ts_book_content_type as d on b.id=d.chapter_id set b.status=1,c.status=1,d.status=1,b.lastupdate_by_id=#{opUser},c.lastupdate_by_id=#{opUser},d.lastupdate_by_id=#{opUser}, b.lastupdatetime=#{opTime},c.lastupdatetime=#{opTime},d.lastupdatetime=#{opTime} WHERE b.id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,b.id as bookId,a.parentid,a.chapter_name as chapter,a.Id,a.sequence,a.grade FROM ts_book_chapter as a,ts_book as b WHERE a.ts_book_id=b.id and b.bookname=#{bookName} and a.status=0 and b.status=0 ORDER BY a.grade,a.sequence
mapper.insert: insert into ts_book_chapter(id,ts_book_id,grade,sequence,chapter_name) select #{id},id,'0',0,CONCAT(#{bookName},'目录') from ts_book where bookName=#{bookName} and status=0
mapper.update: update ts_book_chapter set chapter_name=CONCAT(#{bookName},'目录') where ts_book_id=#{id} and grade='0' and status=0
